text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe Americans know the real timeline of events. You even had the nerve to fund raise using the #coronavirus while millions of small businesses were waiting for the PP loans which you blocked. If lives are lost, look in the mirror to see who is really at fault. #LetThemEatIceCream
